text: Freek Schutten (29 July 1942 in Coevorden – 12 March 2020 in Zwolle) was a Dutch footballer who played, preferably, as a midfielder. Between 1960 and 1976 he played for Zwolsche Boys, Be Quick, SC Drente (Zwartemeer), again Zwolsche Boys and PEC Zwolle. After his playing career he worked at Ahold. He was a scout for the PEC Zwolle youth team. He died, after being ill, in Zwolle on 12 March 2020. After his dead, to commemorate him, PEC Zwolle held a minute of silence before their first home game. The women's team, played with black armbands.In memoriam: Freek Schutten, PEC Zwolle, 13 March 2020 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:PEC Zwolle players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Be Quick 1887 players Category:Eerste Divisie players
title: Freek Schutten
